description: Read a term or a word in a textfile and output the content of the corresponding Wikipedia article.
expected_outputs:
Melampsorella is a genus of fungi belonging to the family Pucciniastraceae.
The species of this genus are found in Europe and Northern America.
Species:

Melampsorella betulina (Fr.) Kleb.
Melampsorella caryophyllacearum (DC.) J.Schröt.
Melampsorella itoana (Hirats.f.) S.Ito & Homma
Melampsorella rigida Har. & Pat.


== References ==

files.name: my_textfile.txt
files.description: A textfile containing a word or a term to look up in Wikipedia
